FLOW_STEP_1.TITLE: Step 1: Prepare the coffee
FLOW_STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Measure %fg into the dosing cup. Set the grinder to %f.

FLOW_STEP_2.TITLE: Step 2: Almost there
FLOW_STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Take the porta filter out, use the dosing cup to transfer the ground coffee to the porta filter basket.

FLOW_STEP_3.TITLE: Step 3: Tamping
FLOW_STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Tamp the coffee. Lock the porta filter back into place.

FLOW_STEP_5.TITLE: Finished
FLOW_STEP_5.DESCRIPTION: All done! Enjoy your coffee (don't forget to clean the porta filter).
